trans-unit.source: Provides untyped access to grouped ASP.NET profile property values.
trans-unit.target: 提供对分组 ASP.NET 配置文件属性值的非类型化的访问。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileGroupBase class is used by ASP.NET to create grouped properties in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 使用 ProfileGroupBase 类在<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>属性</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>中创建分组的属性

trans-unit.source: When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group.
trans-unit.target: 当属性被指定为一组属性使用[组的配置文件 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的属性的元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)，ASP.NET 与组中每个属性的强类型化访问器中创建新的类。

trans-unit.source: The new class inherits the ProfileGroupBase base class.
trans-unit.target: 新的类继承 ProfileGroupBase 基类。

trans-unit.source: The strongly typed accessors of the new class call the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.GetPropertyValue%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.SetPropertyValue%2A> methods of the ProfileGroupBase base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 新的类调用的强类型化访问器<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.GetPropertyValue%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.SetPropertyValue%2A>ProfileGroupBase 方法基类，以检索和设置配置文件属性值分别。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.SetPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.GetPropertyValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProfileGroupBase passes calls to get and set property values to the class that inherits the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class that is supplied to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.Init%2A> method of the ProfileGroupBase class.
trans-unit.target: ProfileGroupBase 通过调用获取并将属性值设置为继承<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类，提供给<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.Init%2A>ProfileGroupBase 类方法</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase.Init%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>的类

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class for more information on behaviors, exceptions, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>行为、 异常和等等的详细信息的类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: This class is not intended to be created from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不应在代码中创建。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase> class to create grouped properties in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase>类来创建<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>属性</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>中的分组的属性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase>

trans-unit.source: When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e) element, ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group.
trans-unit.target: 当属性被指定为一组属性使用[组的配置文件 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的属性的元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)元素，ASP.NET 创建的新类与组中每个属性的强类型化访问器。

trans-unit.source: The new class inherits the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase> base class.
trans-unit.target: 新的类继承<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase>基的类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase>

trans-unit.source: This class is not intended to be created from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不应在代码中创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of a grouped profile property.
trans-unit.target: 获取分组的配置文件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class to create the class for the user profile.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类，以创建用户配置文件的类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，继承<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`用于每个组和中定义的属性类[配置文件元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节。

trans-unit.source: The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the GetPropertyValue method to retrieve untyped values from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the grouped property value.
trans-unit.target: 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用 GetPropertyValue 方法，以检索从非类型化的值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>，生成的访问器，然后强制转换为指定类型和返回作为分组的属性值。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetPropertyValue method to retrieve grouped property values of the user profile for your application by name.
trans-unit.target: GetPropertyValue 方法可用于按名称检索你的应用程序的用户配置文件的分组的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值被类型化为`object`并且必须强制转换为检索时的特定对象类型。

trans-unit.source: For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`.
trans-unit.target: 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以分组的属性按名称访问作为一组的成员<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the grouped profile property.
trans-unit.target: 分组的配置文件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the grouped profile property typed as <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型化为分组的配置文件属性的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Used by ASP.NET to initialize the grouped profile property values and information.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 用于初始化分组的配置文件属性值和信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: The class that inherits <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"></xref> that is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile*> property.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"> </xref> ，分配给<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile*>属性。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the profile property group.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件属性组的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a grouped profile property value indexed by the property name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按属性名称进行索引的分组的配置文件属性值。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to retrieve or set grouped property values of the user profile for your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于检索或设置应用程序的用户配置文件的分组的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Returned values are typed as <xref:System.Object> and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值被类型化为<xref:System.Object>并且必须强制转换为特定对象类型时检索。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of a group of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`.
trans-unit.target: 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以属性按名称访问的组的成员作为<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The name of the grouped profile property.
trans-unit.target: 分组的配置文件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified grouped profile property.
trans-unit.target: 指定分组的配置文件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a grouped profile property.
trans-unit.target: 设置分组的配置文件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class to create the class used for the user profile.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，继承<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`用于每个组和中定义的属性类[配置文件元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)配置节。

trans-unit.source: The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the SetPropertyValue method to pass grouped property values to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> to be stored at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用 SetPropertyValue 方法，以向其传递分组的属性值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>要存储在数据源。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SetPropertyValue method to assign values to grouped properties of the user profile for your application by name.
trans-unit.target: SetPropertyValue 方法可用于将值分配给的用户配置文件的分组属性为应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Values are typed as `object,` and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time.
trans-unit.target: 值必须类型为`object,`，并且类型检查将在运行时完成，则不会编译时间。

trans-unit.source: For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`.
trans-unit.target: 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以分组的属性按名称访问作为一组的成员<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>属性，例如， `Profile.Address.City`。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the grouped property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的分组属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the grouped property.
trans-unit.target: 要赋给该分组的属性的值。
